name: Fire Mote
resistance: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Fire Form
traits.desc: The mote can enter a hostile creature’s space and stop there.

traits.name: Annoying
traits.desc: An enemy in the same space as a mote must make a DC 14 Dexterity (Acrobatics) save when it moves. On a failed save, the mote moves with it. While in the same space as a mote, enemies have disadvantage on Constitution checks to maintain concentration.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mote makes three touch attacks.

actions.name: Touch
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) fire damage.
